thread.title: Coronation Street's Michelle McDonald flies off handle when she learns Steve is dad to Leanne Battersby's baby
thread.title_full: Coronation Street's Michelle McDonald flies off handle when she learns Steve is dad to Leanne Battersby's baby

author: Nicola Methven
title: Coronation Street's Michelle McDonald flies off handle when she learns Steve is dad to Leanne Battersby's baby
text:
TV Coronation Street's Michelle McDonald flies off handle when she learns Steve is dad to Leanne Battersby's baby It's a good, old-fashioned Corrie scrap as Kym Marsh squares up to Cath Tyldesey who simply says 'it was brilliant' Share Michelle Connor comes out fighting with Eva Price Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Michelle McDonald flies off the handle on Corrie tonight, after learning her husband Steve is having a baby with Leanne Battersby. 
And barmaid Eva Price bears the brunt of her rage, when she tries to stop Michelle from doling out free drinks. 
Actress Kym Marsh, 40, who plays Michelle in the ITV soap, said: “She just sees red. Eva is Leanne’s sister and Michelle will not be told what to do by her. 
"She grabs her hair and drags her out of the Rovers. It is a good old-fashioned Corrie scrap.” Read More 
Pub manager Michelle is still reeling from the loss of her baby son, Ruairi, when she finds out Simon Gregson’s character Steve has been cheating. 
Cath Tyldesley, who plays Eva, loved the scenes. She said: “It was brilliant.” Like us on Facebook
